Some companies have guidelines to approve their implementation to be sure everythin was implemented correctly and also verified.
You might want to add an approval status to your plan when your iteration has been finished.
  • Open Administration>Plans>Plan Statuses  
  • Add new status "approved" at the bottom of statuses list
    • Our new approved field should be our final state also having a time stamp when it reached its state. Currently the final state is state "done" marked via "Terminal" checkbox set. Unmark terminal checkbox on state "done" and set Terminal checkbox on approved state.
  • Verify in frontend your functionality is working as expected
    • Set a Plan to state "Done" (no time stamp should be visible)
    • Set a Plan to state "Approved" (time stamp should be visible and historical state of your plan is saved) 
Hint: Terminal statuses will add a time stamp and make plans invisible in navigation sidebar
